column4: how can I get my IVTV drivers working ? I tried following the instructions on the Ubuntu web site w/ no luck, one of the commands there gives me an error
what card are you trying to get working
that card is easy, it should be pretty straightforward
ok, lets start from the beginning...
have you installed ivtv-utils?(sudo apt-get install ivtv-utils)
ok, do ou have VLC installed?
I tried mplayer /dev/video0 and that did not work either
weird, mine worked out of the box everytime.
I did some of the instructions on the ubuntu web site and got half through them, maybe some of the commands I used screwed it up ?
I did everything including change the sources.list
change the sources list?.. there shoul have been no need for that
maybe after I install ivtv utils do I have to reboot the computer ? or add the drivers to the kernel ?
no, you shouldn't have to do any of that... basically, this is how i've set that card up since dapper on clean installs.
is there a daemon or something that has to be running ???
